service: AWS RDS DataService provides Http Endpoint to query RDS databases.

operations.ExecuteSql: Executes any SQL statement on the target database synchronously

refs.ColumnMetadata$arrayBaseColumnType: Homogenous array base SQL type from java.sql.Types.
refs.ColumnMetadata$isAutoIncrement: Whether the designated column is automatically numbered
refs.ColumnMetadata$isCaseSensitive: Whether values in the designated column's case matters
refs.ColumnMetadata$isCurrency: Whether values in the designated column is a cash value
refs.ColumnMetadata$isSigned: Whether values in the designated column are signed numbers
refs.ColumnMetadata$label: Usually specified by the SQL AS. If not specified, return column name.
refs.ColumnMetadata$nullable: Indicates the nullability of values in the designated column. One of columnNoNulls (0), columnNullable (1), columnNullableUnknown (2)
refs.ColumnMetadata$precision: Get the designated column's specified column size.For numeric data, this is the maximum precision.  For character data, this is the length in characters. For datetime datatypes, this is the length in characters of the String representation (assuming the maximum allowed precision of the fractional seconds component). For binary data, this is the length in bytes.  For the ROWID datatype, this is the length in bytes. 0 is returned for data types where the column size is not applicable.
refs.ColumnMetadata$scale: Designated column's number of digits to right of the decimal point. 0 is returned for data types where the scale is not applicable.

refs.ExecuteSqlRequest$awsSecretStoreArn: ARN of the db credentials in AWS Secret Store or the friendly secret name
refs.ExecuteSqlRequest$dbClusterOrInstanceArn: ARN of the target db cluster or instance
refs.ExecuteSqlRequest$sqlStatements: SQL statement(s) to be executed. Statements can be chained by using semicolons

refs.ExecuteSqlResponse$sqlStatementResults: Results returned by executing the sql statement(s)

ResultSetMetadata.base: List of columns and their types.

refs.ResultSetMetadata$columnMetadata: List of columns and their types

refs.SqlStatementResult$resultFrame: ResultFrame returned by executing the sql statement
